LanguageData.OpRo.OpenTimerButtonTT: All connected and powered roofs will open at the selected time
LanguageData.OpRo.CloseTimerButtonTT: All connected and powered roofs will close at the selected time
LanguageData.OpRo.SmallerRadiusTT: Lower the radius of the roof
LanguageData.OpRo.LargerRadiusTT: Increases the radius of the roof
LanguageData.OpRo.OpenRoofsTT: Opens all connected and powered roofs
LanguageData.OpRo.CloseRoofsTT: Close all connected and powered roofs
